text: hananim-ui yejeung gaundeneun i leohan geos-i issnani geudaeneun bulmoui daejileul bolila geuleona hananim-i geugos-e bileul naelini saengmyeong-i umteu go suhwag-i jeung-gahadoda sillo geugeos eul saengdongke hasineun geubun-i jug-eun ja-ege saengmyeong-eul jusineun bun-isini sil lo geubun-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeonneungha sim-ila
